name: LIGHT IN FRUITFUL EFFECT (LIFE) CHARITABLE TRUST

address: Flat No G4, Plot No 386-388, Vindhya Lakeview Apartment,

briefDescription: LIFE Charitable Trust working since December 2009 with the mission of supporting the backward and less privileged people of the society. Our ultimate goal is to uplift the condition of less fortunate and the needy like old age people who have none to look after, destitute and parent less children and to raise awareness about women empowerment and diseases.We aim to offer non-profitable selfless charity and service to all who are in need of basic care, regardless of their religion and caste.Our wide range of offerings include medical assistance, shelter, food, clothes, education to poor/less fortunate children, encourage community development programs, aid physically challenged people.
